00026 int Processor::ProcessMP(Data* data) {
00027 
00028         MT_LOGTRACE("Process multipart dst(" << data->msg->to << "), from ("<<data->msg->from<<")")
00029 
00030         bool isAllPartsRcv = true;
00031         Request* req = GetRequestByMsisdn(data);
00032 
00033         (*(req->parts))[data->udhPartNum].second = true;
00034 
00035         if (req->msg == NULL) {
00036                 req->msg = data->msg;
00037         } else {
00038                 req->msg->body.append(data->msg->body);
00039                 req->msg->context.append(data->msg->context);
00040                 delete data->msg;
00041         }
00042         data->msg = NULL;
00043 
00044         for (unsigned int i = 1; i < req->parts->size(); i++) {
00045                 if (!(*(req->parts))[i].second) {
00046                         isAllPartsRcv = false;
00047                 }
00048         }
00049 
00050         if (isAllPartsRcv) {
00051                 data->msg = req->msg;
00052                 RemoveRequestByMsisdn((char*) req->msg->to.c_str());
00053                 delete req;
00054         } else {
00055                 return 1;
00056         }
00057 
00058         return 0;
00059 }
00060 
00061 void Processor::RemoveRequestByMsisdn(const std::string &to) {
00062         m_mpMap.erase(to);
00063 }

00069 Request* Processor::GetRequestBySN(uint32_t i) {
00070 
00071         Request *req = NULL;
00072         std::map<uint32_t, Request*>::iterator it = m_reqMap.find(i);
00073 
00074         if (it != m_reqMap.end()) {
00075                 req = it->second;
00076                 m_reqMap.erase(it);
00077         }
00078 
00079         return req;
00080 }
00081 
00082 void Processor::setRequestBySN(uint32_t sn, Request* req ){
00083         m_reqMap[sn] = req;
00084 }
00085 
00086 
00087 Request* Processor::GetRequestByMsisdn(Data *data) {
00088 
00089         std::map<std::string, Request*>::iterator it = m_mpMap.find(data->msg->to);
00090         if (it != m_mpMap.end()) {
00091                 return it->second;
00092         }
00093 
00094         Request *req = new Request();
00095         req->parts = new std::vector<PartStatus>(data->udhTotal + 1, PartStatus(0,
00096                         false));
00097         m_mpMap[data->msg->to] = req;
00098 
00099         return req;
00100 }
